Title: Relates to establishing a demonstration program to enforce maximum speed limits on County Road 39 town of Southampton in the county of Suffolk
Summary: Relates to establishing a demonstration program to enforce maximum speed limits on County Road 39 in the town of Southampton in the county of Suffolk.
LawCode: Add ยง1180-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing in the town of Southampton a demonstration program to enforce maximum speed limits on County Road 39 in the county of Suffolk by means of speed limit photo devices; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
